description: The girl was having dinner with her family in a restaurant in Dalston when she was seriously injured.
title: Dalston: Men arrested over shooting which left girl badly injured
title_page: Dalston: Men arrested over shooting which left girl badly injured - BBC News
maintext:
Three men have been arrested on suspicion of conspiracy to murder over a shooting in east London which left a nine-year-old girl with life-changing injuries.
The girl was eating dinner with her family at a restaurant in Kingsland High Street in Dalston one evening in May last year when she was seriously injured.
The Metropolitan Police said on Thursday three men - aged 36, 35 and 28 - were arrested and released on bail pending further investigation.
Scotland Yard said the girl's family had been informed of the arrests and were being supported by specially trained officers. Three other men were injured in the shooting, the force added.
